derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent. (in the modern Latin form): from modern Latin androides, from Greek anēr, andr- 'man' + -oid

encyclopedia.content: Android是一种以Linux为基础的开放源代码操作系统，主要使用于便携设备。目前尚未有统一中文名称，中国大陆地区较多人使用“安卓”或“安致”。Android操作系统最初由...

entry.tran: （科幻小说或电影中的）机器人偶，仿真机器人
entry.def: In science fiction books and films, an android is a robot that looks like a human being.

means.word_mean: 1. an automaton that resembles a human being
